Detailed Description

Bilinear shape function on the square.

Bilinear shape function on the square [-1, 1] x [-1, 1] (i.e. 4 element nodes) You will rarely use this class directly, but might plug it into your own FE traits class as shape_function_t.

Member Function Documentation

size_t imaging::Bilinear2dShapeFunction::face_node ( size_t  face,
size_t  node 
) [static]

Returns the node index (on the element) of the node determined by face_index and face_node_index (on the boundary reference element). E.g. the vertex 1 (there are only vertices 0 and 1 on the boundary reference element) on the face 2 of the square reference element (there are 4 faces with indices from zero to 3) is mapped to vertex 3 on the reference element.

Reimplemented from imaging::ShapeFunction< 4, 2, 2 >.

References imaging::Square2dTransform::face_vertex().

const ublas::fixed_vector< float_t, 2 > &  in 
) const

Returns the value of the shape function corresponding to node_index at in.
